config.title: Header Style 10

variables.menu_drop_font: 400 12px/1.35 Rajdhani, Helvetica Neue, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif
variables.menu_font: 600 12px/1.35 Rajdhani, Helvetica Neue, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif
variables.vermenu_font: 500 12px/1.35 Rajdhani, Helvetica Neue, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif

config.layout_xml:
<body> <referenceContainer name="header.container" htmlClass="page-header header-style-10" /> <referenceContainer name="header.panel"> <container name="header-panel-row" htmlTag="div" after="skip_to_content"> <container name="header-panel-left" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="col-sm-10 header-panel-left" /> <container name="header-panel-right" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="col-sm-14 header-panel-right" /> <container name="header-panel-bottom" htmlId="header-panel-bottom" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="header-panel-bottom cdz-fix-left col-sm-24"> <container name="header-bottom" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="row" > <container name="header-menu-wrap" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="col-sm-16 col-md-18 header-menu-wrap" /> <container name="header-search-wrap" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="col-md-6 col-sm-8 header-search-wrap" /> </container> </container> </container> </referenceContainer>
<move element="utilities.toggle.linkslist" destination="header-panel-left" before="-" /> <move element="logo" destination="header-panel-left" /> <move element="top.links.features" destination="header-panel-right" /> <move element="minicart" destination="links.features.cart" /> <move element="links.features.cart" destination="top.links.features" before="-" />
<referenceBlock name="header-contact-link" remove="true" />
<referenceBlock name="top.links"> <action method="setData"> <argument name="name" xsi:type="string">css_class</argument> <argument name="value" xsi:type="string">header links visible-xs</argument> </action> </referenceBlock>
<move element="header-links-list" destination="utilities.sidebar.left" /> <move element="catalog.topnav" destination="header-menu-wrap" before="-" /> <move element="mobi-cart-placeholder" destination="header-search-wrap" /> <move element="top.search" destination="header-search-wrap" after="-" /> <move element="store-menu-placeholder" destination="store.menu" /> <referenceContainer name="header-panel-right"> <block class="Magento\Store\Block\Switcher" name="header-switch-language" template="Magento_Store::switch/languages-style-02.phtml" /> </referenceContainer> </body>
